data.title: good wings but a mix up
data.text:
We finally decided to give Sparky's a try, we live close by and have seen them on phantom gourmet.
We each got a 10 piece wing meal, hers a garlic parm and mine the volcano. The wings are big and meaty and travel via delivery well. Each come with a side of mac-cheese and dressing for dipping. She loved hers but mine was not the right sauce we believe it had absolutely no heat. They have large steak fries which I enjoy. we also got a 5 piece boneless with hot & sweet chili.
We will definitely go to Sparky's again but will remind them to get the correct sauce.

data.title: Sparky's knows what they are doing!
data.text: Great wings here and that is coming from a person who really doesn't enjoy wings.  My cousin ordered these and I thought, why not.  So, I have to admit, Sparky's knows how to make wings.  They were very tasty & messy, but that is the attraction of wings.

data.title: Great wings
data.text:
I went here after it was recommended on phantom gourmet and they mentioned pb and j wings. I ordered them and they were delicious i just wanted more sauce. 
I also go raspberry habanero wings and they are great too. 
I dont go here that often but when i do i definitely order both.

data.title: Great wings
data.text: Its all about the wings....lots of flavors to choose from i will have to go back. picked up 60 and got three different flavors and they all got eaten

data.title: football
data.text: My husband loves their Chicken wings. It's a favorite place for us to order a snack on game day. He likes his chicken hot but I really like their boneless hawaiian ones.

data.title: Great wings and more
data.text: I love this place. The pb&j wings are just the best and I also go for the ghost pepper wings and the M80's. I'm not a fan of the French fries though. The burgers are pretty awesome as well.

data.title: The best in wings
data.text: I love the variety of wings! Yum about 18 or so different styles! My favorite are the pterodactyl wings and triple trouble. Also the cheese fries are good. Never disappointed. You can eat in pr take out I always take out. The restaurant itself has just a pizza shop feel with lots of in & out traffic.

data.title: The Wings Must be Paved in Gold
data.text: They have great wings, but so over priced and tough to park for quick pickup. I was nice saying this was an average place

data.title: definitely the place for wings
data.text: The food is good, the place is clean, prices are average to a tad high, but I like this place. Wings are the star attraction like the name says but the " and things" are good too. I'm a regular, you will be too.

data.title: Easy party food in Haverhill
data.text: We ordered Sparky's for a house party yesterday. 25 boneless wings, ready in 15 minutes. Quick and yummy option. Super convenient.

data.title: Best Wings
data.text:
Great selection of wings and other goodies.
If you like real hot food they have Ghost Wings and M-80's, stuffed habaneros.
Great, friendly service and they deliver!!!

data.title: Lives Up to the Hype
data.text: I am a bit of a wing connoisseur. And I love trying new wing places while on the road for business travel. After a long day in a business suit, I enjoy digging into a pile of wings without worrying about manners:-). This place definitely lives up to the hype. The wings are absolutely AMAZING. I got the "trouble" flavor which is plenty hot, though not for the faint of heart. Another thing a wing place must be judged by is its ranch and blue cheese dips. You can tell the cheap dips from the good stuff. If it's vinegary and runny than it's the cheap, super processed stuff. If it's thick and creamy, then it's the good stuff. (Nothing ruins a wing more than cheap, gross dip!). Sparky's serves the GOOD stuff. I will definitely go back when in Haverhill.

data.title: Honey Garlic
data.text: We have been going here for years. I always get the Honey Garlic boneless wings. My son completed the Ghostrider challenge and has the T-shirt to prove it. LOL. The owners are always friendly and almost always there. Ok now I am getting hungry....

data.title: Small, Casual, Hot
data.text: Specials are 20+ styles of wings and things.  With bones, without bone.  Lots of different flavors of wings which would be fun to try.  I had the 'Bonfire Hot Wings' while my son enjoyed the hotter 'Double Trouble Wings'.  Both of us enjoyed our choices.  Place was clean.  Host was very nice and helpful with advice on wing choice.  Nothing fancy here to say the least.  Just a small, casual place to get some good, hot wings.

data.title: I am obsessed with Sparky's!!!
data.text: I love this place.  we eat here about twice a month (makes my mouth happy, my waistline, not so much). The wings are to die for - not too big, nice and crispy, and the sauces...OH the sauces!! Firecracker is my favorite, but if I could stand not having it just once I would have one of the 20 or more other sauces.  And the cajun fries - these things rock my world.  Extra Cajun, only way to go.  My husband raves about the double dogs, and switches between cajun dry rub and Thong Thai'd wings (a thai peanut sauce).  To top it off, the owners, Jamie & Andrea, are awesome and always friendly.  A real family business that does everything it can to keep it's customers happy.

data.title: Great wings...
data.text: Tried it for the first time- amazing. They have a trillion flavors. The Flight of the Bumblebee flavor is PHENOMENAL. The wings are definitely pricy, but on the other hand, they are the best wings around. The guys that work there are super friendly, and they deliver anywhere in Haverhill. They serve wings with a side of macaroni salad, which is a perfect contrast to cool off your mouth from the buffalo heat. Can't wait to go back to try more!

data.title: So good!
data.text: Finally!! After a mad search in New England to find some awesome wings, we finally found them at Sparky's. Wings need to be crispy on the outside without too much breading, juicy on the inside, and have an awesome flavor. These were perfect. We've been there twice now, both times I've ordered the Shanghai Noon wings. They started off as just ok, but by the time I was done with my order I wanted to drink the sauce! My bf has gotten two diff flavors both times, so I can't recall his flavors. I do know that he loves spicy food. He tried the double trouble and didn't think they were hot enough. So he asked for a sample of the ghostrider sauce to put on a dry rub and it was crazy, make you sweat hot. I can't wait to go back to try a few more flavors!

data.title: decent food for too much $$$$
data.text: My feelings on sparkies is complicated indeed. The selection is great and the flavors really are outstanding. In fact id eat here all the time if it wasnt for 2 things. First the wings are super small im not the kind of guy who orders boneless but with wings this small you really have to. My other problem is its just a little bit overpriced. The dinners arnt so bad but if you want to buy wings in quanity for a game there deals kind of suck. That being said the food as i said is yummy. I love the peanut butter and jelly which is really a chicken wing coated in a spicy indian peanut sauce with a fruit demi glaze coating. The contrast in flavors just works. In closing the food is good but the value leaves much to be desired.

data.title: Amazing Wings! Great Sauces!
data.text: I didn't have high expectations the first time I ordered Sparky's, and that was my mistake. This hole-in-the-wall in Haverhill has some of the best wings I've ever had. They have a sauce called PB&J that sounds totally weird, but you'll love it if you order it. Sparky's regular buffalo wings are great too, simply called "hot," and they have great steak fries that help tame the heat of the wings (along with the blue cheese and celery). If you're super daring, try the Ghost Chile sauce (ridiculously hot). And last but not least, the people who work at Sparky's are very friendly.

data.title: Awesome Wings Place!
data.text: Freaking awesome wing place North of Boston. Prices wise, it is about the same as Wing It down in Brighton but the owners are awesome. I had the Firecracker Wings and they were FANTASTIC! We also had the Bayou Dry Rub but wasn't as good. I had a hamburger as well and it was very good. I will def come back again. If you live in Haverhill, they deliver as well.
